name: Snowed In (itch) (postpluvium)
description:
Report: Breon-4 S5:

Atmospheric levels promising. Aerial survey shows potential source of water as evidenced by holes in ice crust. No signs of life immediately visible, but further research may prove necessary.

The transmission log of a ship sent to survey an exoplanet.

A very short, simple Twine story to get myself back into writing. Playing with format and style.

Please note that there is no happy end. May contain themes of loneliness, reaching out into an uncaring void, and the tragedy of sentience.
